name: Big Iron (paperjack)
description:
Your daughter is sick.

You quickly need money to save her. The only way is to pack your Big Iron and go bounty hunting.

Controls:

Right Mouse: TAKE OUT YOUR BIG IRON

Left mouse: SHOOT YOUR BIG IRON

R: RELOAD YOUR BIG IRON

WASD: move around

----

I added a version with sensitivity controls - that's the only change.
